statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORT ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERDATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_START_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_END_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORTHISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERDATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_START_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_END_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , SHIP_DATE_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PAYMENT_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , PHONE_V , ORDERDATE_V , FAX_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ADDRESS_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V , QUANTITY_V , YEAR_V , LICENSE_START_V , LICENSE_END_V , MONEY_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V , QUANTITY2_V , YEAR2_V , LICENSESTART2_V , LICENSEEND2_V , MONEY2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V , QUANTITY3_V , YEAR3_V , LICENSESTART3_V , LICENSEEND3_V , MONEY3_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V , SALES_TAX_V , TOTAL_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORT WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , SHIP_DATE_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PAYMENT_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , PHONE_V , ORDERDATE_V , FAX_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ADDRESS_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V , QUANTITY_V , YEAR_V , LICENSE_START_V , LICENSE_END_V , MONEY_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V , QUANTITY2_V , YEAR2_V , LICENSESTART2_V , LICENSEEND2_V , MONEY2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V , QUANTITY3_V , YEAR3_V , LICENSESTART3_V , LICENSEEND3_V , MONEY3_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V , SALES_TAX_V , TOTAL_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORT WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_REPORT(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, SHIP_DATE_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, SHIPPER_NUMBER_V, COMPACT_V, PAYMENT_DATE_V, EMAIL_V, PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V, PHONE_V, ORDERDATE_V, FAX_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, ADDRESS_V, DELIVERYADDRESS_V, ITEM_V, PRODUCT_V, AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V, QUANTITY_V, YEAR_V, LICENSE_START_V, LICENSE_END_V, MONEY_V, ITEM2_V, PRODUCT2_V, AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V, QUANTITY2_V, YEAR2_V, LICENSESTART2_V, LICENSEEND2_V, MONEY2_V, ITEM3_V, PRODUCT3_V, AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V, QUANTITY3_V, YEAR3_V, LICENSESTART3_V, LICENSEEND3_V, MONEY3_V, NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V, SALES_TAX_V, TOTAL_V, NOTE_V, HEAD_V, MANAGER_V, ATTN_V, CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #SHIP_DATE_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #PAYMENT_DATE_V#, #EMAIL_V#, #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#, #PHONE_V#, #ORDERDATE_V#, #FAX_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #ADDRESS_V#, #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#, #ITEM_V#, #PRODUCT_V#, #AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V#, #QUANTITY_V#, #YEAR_V#, #LICENSE_START_V#, #LICENSE_END_V#, #MONEY_V#, #ITEM2_V#, #PRODUCT2_V#, #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V#, #QUANTITY2_V#, #YEAR2_V#, #LICENSESTART2_V#, #LICENSEEND2_V#, #MONEY2_V#, #ITEM3_V#, #PRODUCT3_V#, #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V#, #QUANTITY3_V#, #YEAR3_V#, #LICENSESTART3_V#, #LICENSEEND3_V#, #MONEY3_V#, #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V#, #SALES_TAX_V#, #TOTAL_V#, #NOTE_V#, #HEAD_V#, #MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#, #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#)
statements.statement:
SELECT SID, AXTMODIFY ,REPORTTITLE_V ,REPORTNAME_V ,CUSTOMERNAME_V ,SHIP_DATE_V ,UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V ,SHIPPER_NUMBER_V ,COMPACT_V ,PAYMENT_DATE_V ,EMAIL_V ,PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V ,PHONE_V ,ORDERDATE_V ,FAX_V ,QUOTATIONNO_V ,ADDRESS_V ,DELIVERYADDRESS_V ,ITEM_V ,PRODUCT_V ,AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V ,QUANTITY_V ,YEAR_V ,LICENSE_START_V ,LICENSE_END_V ,MONEY_V ,ITEM2_V ,PRODUCT2_V ,AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V ,QUANTITY2_V ,YEAR2_V ,LICENSESTART2_V ,LICENSEEND2_V ,MONEY2_V ,ITEM3_V ,PRODUCT3_V ,AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V ,QUANTITY3_V ,YEAR3_V ,LICENSESTART3_V ,LICENSEEND3_V ,MONEY3_V ,NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V ,SALES_TAX_V ,TOTAL_V ,NOTE_V ,HEAD_V ,MANAGER_V ,ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
SHIP_DATE_V like #SHIP_DATE_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
SHIPPER_NUMBER_V like #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
PAYMENT_DATE_V like #PAYMENT_DATE_V#
EMAIL_V like #EMAIL_V#
PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V like #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#
PHONE_V like #PHONE_V#
ORDERDATE_V like #ORDERDATE_V#
FAX_V like #FAX_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
ADDRESS_V like #ADDRESS_V#
DELIVERYADDRESS_V like #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#
ITEM_V like #ITEM_V#
PRODUCT_V like #PRODUCT_V#
AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V like #AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V#
QUANTITY_V like #QUANTITY_V#
YEAR_V like #YEAR_V#
LICENSE_START_V like #LICENSE_START_V#
LICENSE_END_V like #LICENSE_END_V#
MONEY_V like #MONEY_V#
ITEM2_V like #ITEM2_V#
PRODUCT2_V like #PRODUCT2_V#
AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V like #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V#
QUANTITY2_V like #QUANTITY2_V#
YEAR2_V like #YEAR2_V#
LICENSESTART2_V like #LICENSESTART2_V#
LICENSEEND2_V like #LICENSEEND2_V#
MONEY2_V like #MONEY2_V#
ITEM3_V like #ITEM3_V#
PRODUCT3_V like #PRODUCT3_V#
AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V like #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V#
QUANTITY3_V like #QUANTITY3_V#
YEAR3_V like #YEAR3_V#
LICENSESTART3_V like #LICENSESTART3_V#
LICENSEEND3_V like #LICENSEEND3_V#
MONEY3_V like #MONEY3_V#
NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V like #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V#
SALES_TAX_V like #SALES_TAX_V#
TOTAL_V like #TOTAL_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
MANAGER_V like #MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V like #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#
order by SHIP_DATE_V desc LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#
statements.select:
SELECT * FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMEMAIL_SETTINGS
SENDERNAME_V like #SENDERNAME_V#
SENDEREMAIL_V like #SENDEREMAIL_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.statement:
Select COUNT(*) AS NUM From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
